headline.print_headline: Ten States, District of Columbia Allow Minors to Buy e-Cigarettes: CDC
headline.main: Ten States, District of Columbia Allow Minors to Buy e-Cigarettes: CDC

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 16 million children in 10 states and the District of Columbia have legal access to electronic cigarettes, according to a federal study released on Thursday.
docs.snippet: More than 16 million children in 10 states and the District of Columbia have legal access to electronic cigarettes, according to a federal study released on Thursday.
